prompt: Design a 404 Not Found page with a light green background (Colors.green[100]). Show '404' in bold dark green (Colors.green[900], font size 72). Display 'Oops, Page Not Found' in green (Colors.green[700], font size 26, semi-bold). Include a message 'The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist.' in gray (Colors.grey[600], font size 16). Add a green 'Back to Home' button with rounded corners (borderRadius: 8) and white text. Use a Column layout with mainAxisAlignment.start and crossAxisAlignment.center to position content at the top center. Apply padding of 24.0 on all sides. Use a Scaffold with the light green background, and add a subtle shadow to the button (elevation: 6).
